name: Contractors Huntington Beach
tag_list: general-contractors-huntington-beach, contractors-huntington-beach-ca, residential-contractors-huntington-beach, commercial-contractors-huntington-beach, household-contractors-huntington-beach-ca, licensed-contractors-huntington-beach, contractors-jobs-hu
overview:
Contractors Huntington Beach is a full service general contractor specializing in home construction, kitchen design, bathroom remodeling as well as swimming pool design. Our company is a complete home improvement company that emphasizes on the latest techniques and environmentally responsible business practice. From new construction to painting, we provide the highest quality consultation, design and craftsmanship to those who are looking to improve their kitchen and bathroom with as little impact on the environment as possible.

We can help you with our following Services: •Cabinet Installation •Drywall and Sheetrock Installation •Drywall and Sheetrock Repair •Barn and Shed Building •Barn and Shed Repair •Outdoor Kitchen Building •Bathroom Remodeling •Kitchen Remodeling •Basement Remodeling •Room Additions •Garage Remodeling

Our utmost asses are the level of craftsmanship, commitment and knowledge that our employees bring to each project. Honesty, attention to detail and reliability are just a few of the things that make a great working environment for everyone. Our general contractors will stand by your side throughout the entire remodeling project and will answer questions you may have regarding our services. Contact us at (714) 228-5639
